# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/apn`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for node-apn (https://github.com/argon/node-apn).

# Details
Files were exported from https://www.github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/types-2.0/apn

Additional Details
 * Last updated: Wed, 05 Oct 2016 20:53:29 GMT
 * File structure: ProperModule
 * Library Dependencies: node
 * Module Dependencies: events, net
 * Global values: none
